official_title: Resolved, that the following-named Members be, and they are hereby, elected to the following standing committees of the House of Representatives: Committee on Armed Services:  John P. Murtha, of Pennsylvania; Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce:  Thomas A. Luken, of Ohio; Committee on Public Works:  Richard F. Vander Veen, of Michigan.

summary.text: Provides for the election of John P. Murtha of Pennsylvania to the House Committee on Armed Services, of Thomas A. Luken of Ohio to the House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce, and of Richard F. Vander Veen of Michigan, to the House Committee on Public Works.

titles.title: Resolved, that the following-named Members be, and they are hereby, elected to the following standing committees of the House of Representatives: Committee on Armed Services:  John P. Murtha, of Pennsylvania; Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce:  Thomas A. Luken, of Ohio; Committee on Public Works:  Richard F. Vander Veen, of Michigan.
